alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:26PM CDT until June 10 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR EASTERN FRONTIER COUNTY... At 1026 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 22 miles southeast of Curtis, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino and Freedom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
